summary: Adds a player quarters in Jorrvaskr basement, perfectly suited for an adventurer constantly on the move.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/E2UWRgS.png[/img][center][size=4]
A true adventurer doesn't settle down in a house or a mansion, they need only a good place
to store their loot and a bed to call their own, and what better place to call
home than among your companions? 

This mod adds a private quarters in the basement of Jorrvaskr that is more up to player
standards. However, it doesn't go completely overboard and is aimed to stay true
to Jorrvaskrs overall design. [/size][/center]


[size=2][color=grey]Notice: Only members of The Companions may call Jorrvaskr their home, therefore the room is not owned by the player before joining.[/color][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/V4ICZte.png[/img][size=3]
          ♦ A bed to sleep in
          ♦ Alchemy station
          ♦ Enchanting table
          ♦ Book cases
          ♦ Display cases
          ♦ One mannequin
          ♦ Lots of storage containers
          ♦ Jorrvaskr map marker[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wY9uWS3.png[/img]

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24736][img]http://i.imgur.com/DEqIaES.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24974][img]http://i.imgur.com/evZCL8N.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58990][img]http://i.imgur.com/YRgi0Wx.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=196968886][img]http://i.imgur.com/wUT6nOi.png[/img][/url][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DaLpbJA.png[/img]
author: StormCrow06

files.changelogHtml:
Added enchanting table
Made adjustments to storage containers

files.name: Jorrvaskr Player Quarters
files.changelogHtml:
Added a mannequin, as requested
Removed two shield mounts as they were clipping with the wall and made invisible (this change does not remove any shield you may have attached, so no worries)
Added a key to the room (This change was primarily made with 'Lockpicking overhaul' in mind which will allow the player to lock the door, making the room unavailable for npcs)
Added a 'Jorrvaskr' map marker for convenient fast travel
